MAN.TITLE: drawlater
MAN.DESCRIPTION:
This function can be used no to draw a axes children. It can specially be used with the drawnow function.
drawlater() is equivalent to set(get("current_axes"),"visible","off")
MAN.EXAMPLE:
set("figure_style","new") // select entity based graphics
h=get("current_figure") //gets handle on the current figure drawlater() t=1:10;plot2d(t,t.^2) drawnow()
MAN.AUTHOR: Djamel Abdemouche
